column1:
CREATE TABLE public.chat_rooms (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    proposal_id uuid,
    entrepreneur_id uuid,
    investor_id uuid,
    last_message text,
    last_message_at timestamp without time zone,
    unread_count_entrepreneur integer DEFAULT 0,
    unread_count_investor integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.deals (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    offer_id uuid,
    proposal_id uuid,
    entrepreneur_id uuid,
    investor_id uuid,
    investment_amount numeric NOT NULL,
    equity_percentage numeric NOT NULL,
    deal_date timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    deal_status text DEFAULT 'active'::text,
    current_roi numeric DEFAULT 0,
    revenue_growth numeric DEFAULT 0,
    last_update timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    notes text,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.messages (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    room_id uuid,
    sender_id uuid,
    content text NOT NULL,
    message_type text DEFAULT 'text'::text,
    attachment_url text,
    read boolean DEFAULT false,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.milestones (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    proposal_id uuid,
    title text NOT NULL,
    description text,
    target_date date,
    completion_date date,
    status text DEFAULT 'pending'::text,
    importance text DEFAULT 'medium'::text,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.notifications (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id uuid,
    title text NOT NULL,
    message text NOT NULL,
    type text DEFAULT 'info'::text,
    link text,
    read boolean DEFAULT false,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.offers (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    proposal_id uuid,
    investor_id uuid,
    amount numeric NOT NULL,
    equity_percentage numeric NOT NULL,
    valuation numeric,
    message text,
    terms text,
    status text DEFAULT 'pending'::text,
    counter_amount numeric,
    counter_equity numeric,
    accepted_at timestamp without time zone,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.proposals (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id uuid,
    title text NOT NULL,
    tagline text,
    description text NOT NULL,
    category text NOT NULL,
    amount_needed numeric NOT NULL,
    equity_offered numeric NOT NULL,
    current_valuation numeric,
    business_stage text NOT NULL,
    revenue numeric DEFAULT 0,
    team_size integer DEFAULT 1,
    location text,
    website text,
    pitch_deck_url text,
    video_pitch_url text,
    status text DEFAULT 'pending'::text,
    funding_received numeric DEFAULT 0,
    funding_goal_percentage numeric DEFAULT 0,
    success_score integer DEFAULT 0,
    milestones_achieved integer DEFAULT 0,
    total_milestones integer DEFAULT 0,
    last_update_date timestamp without time zone,
    verified boolean DEFAULT false,
    featured boolean DEFAULT false,
    views integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.reviews (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    deal_id uuid,
    reviewer_id uuid,
    reviewee_id uuid,
    rating integer,
    review_text text,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.success_metrics (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    proposal_id uuid,
    month date NOT NULL,
    revenue numeric DEFAULT 0,
    users_count integer DEFAULT 0,
    product_launches integer DEFAULT 0,
    media_mentions integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.updates (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    proposal_id uuid,
    user_id uuid,
    title text NOT NULL,
    content text NOT NULL,
    update_type text DEFAULT 'general'::text,
    attachments ARRAY,
    visibility text DEFAULT 'public'::text,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE public.users (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT auth.uid(),
    email text NOT NULL,
    full_name text NOT NULL,
    role text NOT NULL,
    phone text,
    bio text,
    company_name text,
    investment_range_min numeric,
    investment_range_max numeric,
    expertise ARRAY,
    location text,
    profile_picture text,
    verified boolean DEFAULT false,
    is_active boolean DEFAULT true,
    total_investments numeric DEFAULT 0,
    successful_deals integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now()
);
